casebody.data:
EVERETTE MCGREGOR v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (14103)

Lavery, Landau and SchaUer, Js.

Argued January 17 decision released February 13, 1996 William Andrew Lichtenfels, for the appellant (petitioner). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were James E. Thomas, state’s attorney, and John Dropick, senior assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
